choices.C: Mount the MPI adapter in the operating system.
choices.D: Install the Intel MPI library environment. B
choices.A: Install an MPI environment in the operating system.
choices.B: Download and compile the ring_c application.

discussion.content:
D is correct, ring_c is a optional testprogram.

Reference:
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/unified_computing/ucs/usnic/c/deployment/3_1/b_Cisco_usNIC_Deployment_Guide_For_Standalone_C-SeriesServers.html
likely A (B is not mandatory, D is very specific - other MPI library than Intel can do the job)

questions.question_text: You configured a Cisco usNIC connectivity policy, for a HPC environment. Which action also must be completed?

choices.B: Separate FCoE VLANs must be used for FCoE in SAN-A and SAN-B.
choices.E: Cisco UF links must be configured as spanning-tree edge ports.
choices.D: If the converged access switches (in the same San fabric or in the other) must be connected to each over Ethernet links for the purposes of LAN alternate pathing, then sucj links must explicitly be configured to include all FCoE VLANs. This configuration ensures to extend the scope of the Spanning TreeProtocol for FCoE VLANs to Cisco Unified Fabric and non Cisco Unified Fabric links.
choices.C: If MSTP is enabled, a separate MST instance must be used for FCoE VlANs.
choices.F: A shared VLAN can be used to carry traffic for each virtual fabric in the SAN (for example, VSAN 1, VSAN 2, and so on). BCE
choices.A: Cisco Unified Fabric links must be configured as access ports and FCoE VLAN must not be configured as a native VLAN.

questions.question_text: Which three statements are considered best practice when directly connecting converged network adapters to the fabric? (Choose three.)

choices.C: When forwarding an incoming IP packet in a line card, if the Address Resolution Protocol request for the next hop is not resolved, the line card forwards the packets to the supervisor. The supervisor resolves the MAC address for the next hop and programs the hardware.
choices.A: The traffic shaping feature in Cisco NX-OS to avoid bottle necks in the network.
choices.B: Cisco NX-OS supports a rate-limiting feature to manage the access bandwidth policy for a network by ensuring that traffic falling within specified rate parameters is sent, while dropping packets that exceed the acceptable amount of traffic or sending them a different priority.
choices.D: The traffic policing feature manages the maximum rate of traffic through a token bucket algorithm. The token bucket algorithm can use the user-configured values to determine the maximum rate of traffic allowed on an interface at a given moment in time.

questions.question_text: Which statement about glean throttling in Cisco NX-OS is true?

discussion.content:
The Cisco Open SDN Controller is a commercial distribution of OpenDaylight
B,D are corrects.

questions.question_text: Which two statements about the Cisco Open SDN Controller are true? (Choose two.)
questions.answer_description:
The Cisco Open SDN Controller is a commercial distribution of OpenDaylight that delivers business agility through automation of standards-based network infrastructure. It abstracts away the complexity of managing heterogeneous network environments to improve service delivery and reduce operating costs.
As open-source-based software, the Open SDN Controller continuously advances through ongoing innovation and support of the OpenDaylight community.
Reference:
http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/cloud-systems-management/open-sdn-controller/index.html

choices.D: It can be used in multivendor environments.
choices.B: Your own, new network service functions can be added via Java APIs.
choices.C: Security is enforced by using the Open Services Gateway Initiative framework.
choices.E: The controller is available as an appliance only.
choices.A: It is a commercial distribution based on the OpenFlow controller.

discussion.content: C. NPIV requires a "write erase" and then reload the switch in order to come up into NPIV mode.

questions.question_text: Which statement about NPIV is true?

choices.A: NPIV provides a means to assign multiple Fibre Channel IDs to a single N-port.
choices.E: NPIV must not be enabled on a switch that is also running N-port virtualization.
choices.C: NPIV requires a "write erase" and then reload the switch in order to come up into NPIV mode.
choices.D: NPIV is a Cisco proprietary feature and as such works only between two Cisco switches.
choices.B: NPIV can be enabled on a per-VSAN basis.
